triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes Twitter data to understand user demographics and representativeness.

triples.name: Demography
triples.relevance: The paper applies demographic analysis to understand Twitter user populations across geography, gender, and race/ethnicity.

triples.name: Social media
triples.relevance: The paper studies a social media platform and its user base characteristics.

triples.name: United States census
triples.relevance: The paper compares Twitter population to U.S. census data to assess representativeness of the Twitter population.

triples.name: Sampling bias
triples.relevance: The paper develops techniques to identify and quantify non-uniform sampling bias in Twitter's user population compared to U.S. demographics.
